name: bun-test-utils
description: A collection of test utilities for Bun projects

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:types
scripts.build:esm: bun build index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --minify --target bun
scripts.build:cjs: bun build index.ts --outfile dist/index.cjs --format cjs --minify --target bun
scripts.test:build: bun run build && echo 'Testing CJS:' && node -e "console.log(Object.keys(require('./dist/index.cjs')))" && echo 'Testing ESM:' && node --input-type=module -e "import('./dist/index.js').then(m => console.log(Object.keys(m)))"
